name: Wikipedia - Biography (LLM)
context:
Extract biographical information from this Wikipedia article. Page URL: {{url}}. Page content: {{content}}.

This is a Wikipedia biography article. Extract information from both the infobox (if present) and the article text.

Return ONLY the requested data with NO explanatory text or prefixes. If a field is not found, return an empty string.

Person's full name (without parenthetical disambiguators or dates)
Birth date (in format DD MMM YYYY if possible, e.g., 15 Dec 1922)
Birth place (full location with city, state/country)
Death date (in format DD MMM YYYY if possible)
Death place (full location)
Vital information summary (format as markdown list with bold labels like **Born:** date in place, **Died:** date in place, **Nationality:** country, etc. - ONLY include lines for fields that have data, skip fields with no data)
Biographical summary (2-3 paragraph summary of the person's life, focusing on key events, achievements, and historical context - synthesize from article text, do not just copy the lead paragraph)
Occupations and notable achievements (list primary occupations, positions held, major accomplishments, awards, publications, etc. - format as markdown list)
